Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India
praying to issue a Writ of Mandamus, to direct the respondents to
forthwith extend the Bar License Period of the Petitioner for the
TASMAC wine shop No.4079 corresponding to the closure period due to
COVID 19 Pandemic, by considering and passing necessary orders on
the representation of the petitioner dated 22.09.2021.
